description: Frieren`s Party test the spell, which produces a bottle of Ajipon. They try the sauce with meat and find that it is delicious. Stark wonders if the sauce would taste good with dragon meat, and Frieren and Fern tell him to go defeat a dragon on his own so they can see.

titles.title: Magic Special Episode: Magic to Make for a Merry Dining Table
